word: PAGE 64. MANIFESTATION OF THE HOLY SPIRIT CONDEMNED AS FANATICISM: IN 1893 THE SPIRIT OF GOD WAS POURED OUT IN A MARKED MANNER AT THE GENERAL CONFERENCE SESSION IN BATTLE CREEK, AND AT THE COLLEGE. UNFORTUNATELY THERE WERE SOME WHO FELT THAT THIS WAS AN INDICATION OF FANATICISM. SEE SELECTED MESSAGES, BOOK 1, PAGES 130, 131, FOR ANOTHER REFERENCE TO THIS EXPERIENCE.
